title.en: 32-sai Shufu, Oshi to 100 Manen de Date suru - Men Chika Concafe-numa

altTitles.ja: 32歳主婦、推しと100万円でデートする～メン地下コンカフェ沼～

altTitles.ja-ro: 32-sai Shufu, Oshi to 100 Manen de Date suru - Men Chika Concafe-numa

description.en:
Kamoi Minori is an ordinary 32-year-old housewife.
Her husband Kuniaki, whom she married five years ago in an arranged marriage, is a man with a morally harassing temperament who yells at her whenever he doesn't like something.
The couple's relationship has long since cooled off, and of course they have no sex.
She spent her days just trying to make ends meet while listening to her husband's moods, and she felt like a tame child with nothing to look forward to or hope for.
One day, she discovers that Kuniaki has been paying off several girls through daddyhood.
When he talks to his friends about it, they invite him to go to a "cat café" for a change of pace, but it turns out to be not a cat café but a concept café where men serve underground idols....?
